page.title: 05A Week-end With Sarah
page.content: On{Saturday}morning a friend came to stay.We played dressing-up,dancing and singing.Later we played with our Sindy dolls then we went to visit another friend.We stayed there for a while and then came home for dinner. After dinner we went to the park.We went back to my friend's and played on her swings and in her Wendy House. Later we went home for tea. Soon after tea we went to bed,read books and then went to sleep. On{Sunday}morning we got up and played,then had breakfast.At 11:15 a.m. we went to church and we got a {ST.JOHN'S GOSPEL}each. After church we had roast for dinner. We played under the stairs in my little house then we took my friend home.When we came back I had some tea watched TV and then went to bed. By {SARAH POLLARD.
